Starting to work on milestone v123

Change-Id: Ie86ea850907c090528c42f172d98ea7e6de8efa3

Fix for issue #332

In KitKat, the default behavior of GScaleGestureDetector has been change:
It will now enable by default the double-tap and slide to zoom. Which is
a bad behavior for us.

Removing one level from main_ui

Some devices (notably, Android 2.3.5) will crash on the main_ui.
The reason is a StackOverflow due to the many layers of the UI. I was
able to remove one layer.
